title: Nexus Blitz is a success, Gj Riot!
body: I actually played like 15 games of this new game mode and it was fun even when we were losing. I think that its a success because I can actually feel the happiness of playing this game for fun. Since the game is changing a lot and the meta inst really good for me and/or my champs, I think that this game mode is making league fun again! The events are really fun! Well... i just wanted to say gj riot, my friends and i had a lot of fun today playing Nexus Blitz, zero tilt ! :D
